import React from 'react'; import './TermsAndConditions.css'; // Create this CSS file for styling, if necessary const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions

Last updated: September 29, 2024

1. Introduction

Welcome to Overlays Clothing. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, please refrain from using our website.

2. Intellectual Property

The content, trademarks, and other intellectual property rights available on our website are the property of Overlays Clothing. You may not use, copy, or distribute any content without written permission from us.

3. Use of Website

When using this website, you agree to use it in a lawful and responsible manner. You agree not to:

  • Engage in any activities that violate any local, national, or international laws.
  • Transmit any viruses or harmful software.
  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website.

4. Orders and Payment

All orders placed through our website are subject to availability. We reserve the right to cancel or refuse any order at our discretion. Payment for products must be made through our provided payment methods.

5. Limitation of Liability

We shall not be held responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or products.

6. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to update or modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting them on our website or via email.

7. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms, feel free to contact us at contact@overlaysclothing.com.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
